The original news graphic was published: net on March 12, 2020, which can be verified through reverse image and keyword searches on Google.
Inquirer: net issued a statement on Facebook on March 13, 2021, clarifying that the dates in the circulating social media post were manipulated and it was a rehash of a news post from March 12, 2020.
The Philippine presidential spokesperson: s office also reminded social media users to "check the date" of online posts about travel restrictions and stated that 2020 news stories were being circulated as if they were new to deliberately cause fear.
